children.text: The wall insulation has not been installed around window and door openings.
The relevant Australian Standard AS 3999 Thermal Insulation of Dwellings - Bulk Insulation - Installation Requirements, states in section 5.4.3.1 that
‘There shall be no gaps between the insulation material and the frame or any abutments with adjacent material’.
The wall insulation must be installed around the window and door frames to ensure thermal performance prior to the plaster installation.
